title: 关于GroupManager
author: spacebb
txt_content:
本帖最后由 spacebb 于 2012-7-2 17:19 编辑 

GroupManager
groups.yml文本编辑里面的每个组别前缀 用中文.插件就失效
但是我看到一些服务器前缀是中文.非手动.是自动分配中文前缀  例如生存者
这个如何实现.

replies.author: spacebb
replies.txt_content:
清风后悔 发表于 2012-7-2 17:30 
需要帮忙？
需要...

replies.author: 清风后悔
replies.txt_content:
# Group inheritance
# any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# These groups are defined in the globalgroups.yml
# and can be inherited in any worlds groups/users.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and defined in the this groups.yml file.

groups:
  OP:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - backup.* #给予所有权限，默认op拥有，下面的权限没有默认对象
    - backup.backup #使用命令
    - backup.reload #重载插件设置
    - backup.notify #获取备份工作提示
    - backup.bypass #拥有该权限的玩家将不被视为在线玩家
    - backup.help #观看帮助菜单
    - backup.list #显示备份列表
    - backup.config #浏览设置文件
    - backup.log #浏览日志文件
    - backup.updateconf #升级设置文件
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&9[op]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - delhome
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.delhome
    - essentials.sethome.multiple
    - showcase.basic
    - showcase.buy.finite
    - showcase.buy.infinite
    - showcase.exchange
    - showcase.finite
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2[冒险家]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: spacebb
replies.txt_content:
清风后悔 发表于 2012-7-2 17:39 
# Group inheritance
# any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# These groups are ...
 prefix: '&2[冒险家]'
主要是这项.
冒险家3个中文字导致插件崩溃.

replies.txt_content:

prefix: '&2[冒险家]'

replies.txt_content:
清风后悔 发表于 2012-7-2 18:13 
下载一个客户端跟服务端的中文补丁
服务端有安装中文输入补丁
插件奔溃和客户端没关系..
就是用了中文前缀.然后插件奔溃了
